body: Touhou 4, Lotus Land Story, also known as Gensoukyou, released in the 14th of August 1998 at Comiket 54. It sold approximately 300 copies (take this with a grain of salt as I got this info from megapig9001, and don't know the original source). It was released exclusively for the PC-98.
